inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: positive MPO-ANCA test together with clinical features characteristic of ANCA-positive diseases as detailed in the 2012 Chapel Hill Consensus Conference Definitions

inclusion.criterion: Treated with rituximab-induced continuous B cell depletion and in remission for at least 24 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: CD20 (B cells) undetectable at time of enrollment/randomization
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Urine Hcg negative for women of child bearing potential and not planning to become pregnant for at least 12 months from enrollment and at least 12 months after any study related rituximab dose
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Judged to be otherwise healthy by the Investigator, based on medical history and physical examination (no known active disease process for which life expectancy is less than 36 months)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Secondary Disease: disease suspected to be induced by levamisole-adulterated cocaine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment: additional immunosuppressive agents other than rituximab and/or total daily prednisone dose ≥ 7.5 milligrams
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Terminal cancer or other primary illness with life expectancy of less than 36 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active anti-GBM disease and other known autoimmune disease for which the need for additional immunosuppression is likely
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Wegener's granulomatosis was diagnosed for him

notes: Patient has a history of Wegener's granulomatosis and is currently being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. He also has a high Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) which may indicate active disease.
